global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: Cannot validate application time with server time. make sure you are connected to the internet!
global.changingLanguageNeedsRestartToTakeEffect: Changing language requires the app to restart. Do you want to restart now?
global.pleaseAddAccountToSignTheTransaction: Por favor añade una cuenta para firmar la transacción

slideOne.title:
Payments and
payment requests
on the XRP ledger

slideTwo.title: User friendly access
slideTwo.desc: Add multiple accounts, in full access mode, or read only. Send transactions and sign requests with your full access accounts.

slideThree.title: Security first
slideThree.desc: The xumm application and platform are built with security in mind. Never enter your secrets again, sign a transaction from your own, trusted device.

slideFour.title: Enviar y recibir
slideFour.desc: You can send and receive XRP and other trusted fiat currencies (IOU's) as well

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: Utilizamos el código pin para bloquear la app, confirme la configuración y mantenga su cuenta segura.
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: Necesitarás un código pin para desbloquear la app

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: To keep your account more secure you can activate the use of FaceID or a Fingerprint.

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: Utilizamos notificaciones push para mandar peticiones de firma

home.howActivateMyAccountDesc: To prevent spam account creation, the XRP ledger requires at least 20 XRP to be deposited into an account to activate it. The 20 XRP is not lost: it will remain in your account, but you cannot spend it. To start using your account, make sure a deposit greater than 20 XRP is made to your account.
home.otherCurrenciesDesc: The XRP ledger also allows you to hold balances of, and to send and receive, currencies other than XRP. These currencies can be issued by other accounts on the XRP ledger. If you want to be able to send or receive a non-XRP currency, you will have to trust the issuer of the non-XRP currency.

events.transactionFailedWithCode: This transaction failed with a status code of %{txCode}

profile.availableInFuture: This features will be available in the future.
profile.connectMobile: Be found by phone mumber / e-mail

settings.getStartedCreateContact: Get started by adding your first contact.
settings.areYouSureRemoveContact: Are you sure you want to remove this contact?
settings.nodeChangeWarning: You are switching from %{from} to %{to}. You may be unable to use your account or view your account history!
settings.invalidNodeURL: Entered node url is not a valid url!
settings.securitySettingsDescription: Change your pincode or your biometric authentication authority here
settings.newOldPasscodeNotMatch: The new pincode and your confirmation are not the same!
settings.canNotSendLogsByEmail: An unexpected error occurred, can not sent logs by email!

account.addAccountDescription: Import your existing account, or create a new account.
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Please provide the numbers, this is for your own safety: we want you to confirm you wrote it down.
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: You have just created a new fresh account.
account.pleaseEnterSafePassphrase: Create an extended lenght passphrase that is easy to remember, but impossible for others to guess.
account.passphraseShouldContain: Your passphrase strength should be at least Fair, please use a long or more difficult passphrase (long passphrase is better).
account.chooseWisely: Please choose the security level that suits this account
account.passcodeOptionDesc: This is ideal for daily spending. You can sign transactions by simply show your face, scanning your finger or entering your passcode.
account.passphraseOptionDesc: This is better for long term storage of XRP and requires a passphrase to sign transactions
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Here's your new account. You can receive funds to the generated public account address.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Account address copied to the clipboard
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Write down all the rows on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe! If your device crashes and you don't have the secret numbers anymore, your funds are LOST.
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Only you can touch your funds, but you will have to keep your secret numbers safe. Your secret consists of 8 rows (labelled A-H) containing 6 digits per row.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Never share your secret numbers (private key) with someone else. If you do you may lose access to your funds.
account.pleaseWriteDownAllNumbers: Please write down all the numbers
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (input will be cleared for security reasons)
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: Please select your account secret type
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: You can upgrade a read only account to a full access account later on
account.secretNumbersDesc: Preferred account type. 8 rows of 6 digits
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Please provide your account address 
(Starts with 'r...')
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Please provide your Mnemonic (24 words) for your account.
account.howManyWordsYourMnemonicIs: How many words has your mnemonic?
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Please provide your account secret/family Seed.
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Please enter a name for this account, e.g. 'Spending' or 'Savings'.
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Get started by adding your first account.
account.accountSettingsDescription: You can edit your account settings or account label here.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are upgrading your access level, You need to import your private key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are downgrading your access level, this will cause losing private key for this account. are you sure ?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: You are removing this currency from your account, this action cannot be undo, are you sure?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Changing Security level is not available right now
account.accountDestroyWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently, are you sure?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Account label should be less than 16 character!
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Selected account is not activated, for sign this transaction you need to select a activated account!
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Master key for this account is disabled and regular key account not found in accounts list!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Regular key account for this account does not imported with sign access!
account.currentPassphraseShouldNotBeEmpty: Current Passphrase should not be empty!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: All done, you can go to the next step
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: the transaction DISABLES the private key for the account. This may lock you out. Only continue if you are absolutely sure this is what you want, and you know what you are doing.

send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: Amount is bigger than what you can spend (%{spendable})
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Balance is not enough to covert the fee (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Source and Destination address cannot be same!
send.transferredSuccessfully: Your transaction has been successfully registered on the XRP ledger.
send.submittingToLedger: Sending your transaction to the XRP ledger
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destination account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportCurrency: Selected account do not support selected currency.
send.memoPublicWarning: La información del Memo será pública para todos
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have any balance. To activate an account on the XRP ledger, a initial deposit of at least 20 XRP is required.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have any balance. If you continue sending to this account, 20 XRP of the %{amount} XRP will be used to activate the account on the XRP ledger, meaning 20 XRP will not be spendable. Are you sure you want to continue?
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have any balance. To activate an account on the XRP ledger, an initial deposit of at least 20 XRP has to be sent to the account. Non XRP currencies cannot be used for the initial deposit.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: The destination tag is required for sending this payment.

currency.selectAnExchangeAndSelectCurrency: Select an issuer and select the currency you would like to add. This list is maintained by the XUMM developers.
currency.successRemoved: Currency successfully removed from your account

exchange.doYouWantToExchange: Are you sure you want to exchange %{payAmount} %{payCurrency} for %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}?
exchange.failedExchange: Cannot exchange right now due to lack of liquidity, or updated exchange rates.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: There is not enought liquidity, cannot exchange right now!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: There's relatively low liquidity. You can still continue, but you may not get the best rate for your entire exchange!

scan.pleaseScanXRPAddress: Por favor escanee el QR de la dirección XRP
scan.scannedQRIsNotXRPAddress: ¡El QR escaneado no es una dirección XRP!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: ¡El código Qr no es lo que esperábamos!

payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: This payload has already been signed or rejected. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.payloadExpired: This payload has expired. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Invalid or missing signed transaction blob
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: The payload is invalid, and will be automatically rejected.
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: Will ignore the request and close.
payload.notEnoughtLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Not enough liquidity to send this payment.
